options.a: To a biologist, flowers are morphological and embryological marvels and are the site of sexual reproduction
options.b: Floral buds arise from floral primordium
options.c: A typical angiospermic anther is single lobed
options.d: The proximal end of filament is attached to thalamus or petal

hint: Standard anther has two lobes, each with two microsporangia)
